column2:
# Default game of poker
customRoundOfPoker(list(scoreHighCard, scorePairRanker, scoreTwoPairRanker, scoreTripRanker,  scoreStraightRanker, scoreFlushRanker, scoreFullHouseRanker, scoreQuadRanker),0,9)

Please look at the graphics window to see the current hand.

The score of each player is one of the following:
	9 = Straight Flush
	8 = Four of a Kind
	7 = Full House
	6 = Flush
	5 = Straight
	4 = Three of a Kind
	3 = Two Pair
	2 = Pair
	1 = Highcard
The scores for this hand are:
The winners of this hand are Players
